author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1294 New connection is not reference counted.  Merged in from trunk r929184.  Original patch by Pinaki.

author: gstein
msg: Add a new wc_db temporary function to explicitly examine the copyfrom
columns on a WORKING_NODE row to see if they should be inherited, rather
When a row has explicit copyfrom data, then the commit process will
generate a second "Adding" operation, rather than relying on the copy
occurring at the operation root. We do not want these extra operations.
[note: r929360 committed the wc-queries.sql missing from this rev]

author: gstein
msg: (svn_sqlite__update): note that AFFECTED_ROWS may be NULL
